attributes.action: I demand a UK general election as soon as is practically possible due to a lack of confidence in the current government to adequately run the country
attributes.additional_details:
The current Government seem to have forgotten they are voted into power to SERVE the PEOPLE!!! I've never seen so many strikes, protests and riots in the first year and a half of a Governments term.

I demand a general election as soon as is practically possible due to a lack of confidence in the current government to adequately run the country
